original_title: Faîlî Dewlet | State is the Perpetrator
overview: Throughout the 1990s, many people in North Kurdistan were subjected to interrogations. This quickly turned into torture, and then murder, with their bodies then dumped into the forests, eliminated in vats of acid, or burnt in furnaces. Some of them were buried in “unknown” places with only a handful of soil to over them.
title: Faîlî Dewlet | State is the Perpetrator
